title: Daggers
content: cing None Piercing Strike Artificial Leech 1d4 +1 Piercing Hand Me My Leech: Equips the Surgeon with a bloated, biting leech, allowing him to cast Leech. Lethal Leech: Suckle a foe with hundreds of piercing teeth, making them Bleed. None Assassin's Touch 1d4 +1 Piercing Weapon Enchantment +1 Deathly Slumber: Deals an additional 1~4 Necrotic Damage to creatures that are Knocked Out or Sleeping.
